product_name: Vittoria Corsa Evo CX Tubular Tire - 700 x 23 / 25
long_description: The handmade Vittoria Corsa Evo CX tubular tire offers podium-level performance, thanks to an astounding 320 tpi casing, superb handling and light weight. Corespun 320 tpi cotton casing offers unparalleled flexibility for a sublimely supple ride quality and lowered rolling resistance, even at high psi. Kevlar(R) SiO2 compound features a high silica content with microscopic particles of Kevlar, creating an excellent balance of grip, longevity and low rolling resistance. Performance-tuned tread is firmer along the crown for increased longevity, with the shoulders getting a softer herringbone tread for excellent cornering. A pliable, thin belt of aramid fiber is placed under the tread to supply excellent puncture protection without compromising tire performance. Fully encased latex inner tube provides low rolling resistance and offers added puncture resistance. 42mm Presta valve can be removed for compatibility with deep-dish rims (valve extenders not included). Recommended pressure for the Vittoria Corsa Evo CX tubular tire is 115 - 200 psi (8 - 14 BAR). Not compatible with clincher wheels.
short_description: The handmade Vittoria Corsa Evo CX tubular tire offers podium-level performance, thanks to an astounding 320 tpi casing, superb handling and light weight.
